channel.title: Land-Use Planning on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Land-Use Planning on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for Sustainable Land-Use Planning
item.description:
What you can do

  • Site surveys and constraints mapping
  • Monitoring and plan verification
  • Stakeholder engagement records

Works with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare forms and styles in QGIS and collaborate via QFieldCloud across teams.
